name: The Traveller
description:
"The Traveller" is a high quality erotic Visual Novel/Game with plenty of adventures.

The Traveller (it's his code name and yes, he is half British), a mysterious young man with many talents and a good sense of humor visits various places and completes certain tasks for a secret organization.

He is young, spirited and full of energy. The Traveller has a strong sense of justice and is always ready to help people out of trouble, especially sexy girls.

In this game you need to accomplish your mission in a city and if you play it right, you can make friends with some hot local girls. Well, more than friends, of course.

What's included:

- Three assignments to complete
- 10 hot girls you can meet (ranging from waitresses to FBI agents and celebrities)
- 20+ different locations
- 18 characters in total
- HQ animations
- Multiple choices
- Multiple endings
- Good humor
- Bonus video for the winner
- 2-3 hours of play

Realistic characters and locations, intriguing plot and hot sex action - this unique game has it all!
